# StepTap class

Represents a step that allows interception of the current [Step](./trotsky.step.md) instance for custom processing or side effects.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class StepTap<P = ParentConstraint, C = unknown, O = null> extends Step<P, C, O> 
```
**Extends:** [Step](./trotsky.step.md)<!-- -->&lt;P, C, O&gt;

## Remarks

The `StepTap` class enables the execution of a provided interceptor function, which receives the current step as its argument. This is useful for debugging, logging, or performing side effects without altering the main flow.
